--- product_code: ls13 description: 10mm German Orgelgeschütz (Organ Guns) title: 10mm German Orgelgeschütz (Organ Guns) breadcrumb: Orgelgeschütz (Organ Guns) name: German Orgelgeschütz (Organ Guns) cost: $12.00 paypal_id: EXS87GQ637WKA ---

A Ribauldequin was an anti-personal weapon consisting on many small caliber guns arranged in parallel or a fan shape.

This is an Orgelgeschütz (Organ Guns) unit of two organ guns and six crew. You will recieve two organ gun barrels (ls13a), four reinforced spoked wheels (ls_a) and six crew (a mix of ls15a–i).
